name: Audio Arena
description: Audio Arena is a single player arena game in which the gameplay is generated by music.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or greater Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD R9 290 equivalent or greater Storage: 700 MB available space

reviews.review_text: A great game and a very enjoyable VR experience.  Some sense of rhythm recommended :)
possibly the best rhythm game on the Vive. Good # of songs and most are very catchy.. very simple yet addicting gameplay and looks great in VR
